short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiple selection does just what the name suggest - it allows you to have multiple selections at the same time, which you can copy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiple selection is inspired by the Sublime Text Editor and does just what the name suggest - it allows you to have multiple selections at the same time, which you can copy.
